Bouncer: Endless Scroll Blocker

Are you tired of losing hours to endless scrolling on social media and news sites? Endless Scroll Blocker is your digital ally in the fight against online time-wasting. This powerful Chrome extension helps you regain control of your browsing habits and boost your productivity.

Key Features:

Smart Scroll Detection: Automatically detects when you've been scrolling for too long.
Customizable Blacklist: Block endless scrolling on specific websites or entire domains.
Scroll Statistics: Track your scrolling habits with insightful metrics.
Gentle Interruptions: Smoothly scrolls you back to the top when you've reached your limit.
Flexible Controls: Easily enable/disable the blocker and manage your blacklist.

Why You Should Install:

Reclaim Your Time: Stop losing hours to mindless scrolling and focus on what truly matters.
Increase Productivity: Reduce distractions and improve your online efficiency.
Develop Healthier Browsing Habits: Become more aware of your scrolling behavior and make positive changes.
Customizable Experience: Tailor the extension to your specific needs and preferences.
Privacy-Focused: All data is stored locally on your device.

Endless Scroll Blocker is perfect for students, professionals, and anyone looking to cultivate more mindful internet usage. Take the first step towards a more balanced digital life - install Endless Scroll Blocker today and transform your browsing experience!
